content: (this is a mistake, how do I delete a message?)
On the mobile app or the desktop app or via the web interface?
I am on the desktop app or the browser, don't have the mobile app.
Andrej Bauer has marked this topic as resolved.
You can click on the pencil near the top right of the message and delete what you wrote; then the message becomes "(deleted)". Note however that you can view the edit history of any message on Zulip.
I usually just cross things out say the right thing in the first place, rather than delete my messages
